sentences.en: A thrush alighted on a branch of the pine tree.
sentences.cn: 一只鸫落在松树的树枝上。

sentences.en: As a kid, I loved to climb trees.
Every tree, wall and fence stood out against dazzling white fields.
sentences.cn: 每棵树、每堵墙和每道栅栏都在白得耀眼的田野映衬下十分夺目。

sentences.en: He arrives in his biplane and crash lands it in a tree.
sentences.cn: 他驾驶双翼飞机到达，在一棵树上紧急降落。

sentences.en: He sees himself going right to the top of the tree.
sentences.cn: 他预见自己在同行中将无人可及。

sentences.en: He started to hack away at the tree bark.
He was a huge man, built like an oak tree.
sentences.cn: 他是个大块头，结实得像棵橡树。

sentences.en: If the soil is allowed to dry out the tree could die.
sentences.cn: 如果任由土壤变干，这棵树可能会枯死。

sentences.en: Jose, as usual, had climbed a tree to keep watch.
sentences.cn: 乔斯像往常一样爬到树上放哨。

sentences.en: Sometimes they have to chop down a tree for firewood.
sentences.cn: 他们有时只好砍树当柴烧。

sentences.en: The car ploughed through three gardens and flattened a tree.
sentences.cn: 小轿车轰然穿过3个花园，还碾倒了一棵树。

sentences.en: The driver failed to negotiate a bend and ran into a tree.
sentences.cn: 司机没能顺利拐弯，撞到了树上。

sentences.en: The tree's roots are stripped and hung to season and bleach.
sentences.cn: 树根剥皮后挂起来风干晒白。

sentences.en: the trunk of an old oak tree (= the main central part, from which the branches grow )
The wolf clawed at the tree and howled the whole night.
sentences.cn: 这匹狼用爪子挠着树，嚎叫了整晚。

sentences.en: This tree is always recognizable by its extremely beautiful silvery bark.
sentences.cn: 这种树很容易辨认，因为它有着非常漂亮的银色树皮。

sentences.en: You are absolutely correct. The leaves are from a bay tree.
sentences.cn: 你说得很对，这是月桂树的叶子。

words.tran_cn: 驱赶…上树；在…上植树；长成树（tree的过去分词）
被...驱赶上树,上树以躲避

phrases.tran_cn: [数]二叉树；[计]二进制树形网络
家谱；系统；家系图；系谱图
(如长在树上般)伸手可得，轻易得到
(非正式，主北美)极傻的；发疯的
生成树；最大树生成树；跨越树
(非正式，主北美)陷于困境的；被逼至困境的
处于一个非常困难或迷惑的境地；无助的

trans.tran_en: a very tall plant that has branches and leaves, and lives for many years
a very tall plant that has branches and leaves, and lives for many years
